channel.title: [PI] Duel arena log-out bug. Rep++
channel.description:
This is only at the duel arena area, 1 space outside of the duel arena and this does not happen, This happens nowhere else just here. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Picture of the server when a player logs out at duel arena. [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1599vd.png[/img]
I have tv, skype, a shoutbox on my website if needed. Also will give Rep++
Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thank-you ~Andy
